name: focused-cfr-shield-study
description: A Firefox Shield study to evaluate in-context feature recommendations.

scripts.firefox: export XPI_NAME=dist/focused-cfr.xpi FIREFOX_BINARY=/Applications/FirefoxNightly.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin && npm run build && node manual_test.js
scripts.watch: onchange 'addon/**' 'package.json' 'template/**' -e addon/install.rdf -e addon/chrome.manifest -e addon/StudyUtils.jsm -- npm run build -- '{{event}} {{changed}} $(date)'

author: Kamyar Ardekani <kamyar@mozilla.com>

addon.name: Focused Contextual Feature Recommender Shield Study
addon.creator: Kamyar Ardekani <kardekani@mozilla.com>
addon.description: Shield-powered Contextual Feature Recommender Study. For more info visit http://github.com/raymak/cfr-focused-beta.
